header.title: Which Superhero Are You?
header.subtitle: Discover your inner superhero through this personality test!

red.name: The Adventurous Innovator
red.description: You are curious, impulsive, and love new experiences. You get energized by new ideas and aren't afraid to venture into unknown territory.

yellow.name: The Social Optimist
yellow.description: You are warm, outgoing, and enthusiastic. You love being around others and easily spread positive energy.

green.name: The Calm Harmonizer
green.description: You seek balance, harmony, and good relationships. You are a good listener, cooperative, and caring.

blue.name: The Analytical Planner
blue.description: You are systematic, reliable, and thorough. You like clear plans and appreciate predictability.

1.text: How do you prefer to start a new week?

options.red: Jump right into new projects without a clear plan, ready for whatever comes up.
options.yellow: Get colleagues together for a joint kick-off, filling the room with laughter and enthusiasm.
options.green: Sit down with a good friend and calmly share ideas over a cup of tea.
options.blue: Make a detailed list of tasks and prioritize them in the right order.

2.text: How do you handle unexpected challenges?

options.red: Jump right in, improvise and use the momentum.
options.yellow: Gather the team for a pep talk meeting and solve the problem together.
options.green: Try to mediate and create calm, find a harmonious solution.
options.blue: Set aside time to analyze the situation and create an action plan.

3.text: A friend invites you to an activity you've never tried before. What do you do?

options.red: Jump right in, no matter what it is – love trying new things!
options.yellow: Ask if you can bring more friends, make it a social event.
options.green: Make sure it will be in calm and pleasant surroundings.
options.blue: Read up about the activity beforehand, prepare mentally.

options.red: An unknown place, no plans – just freedom and adventure.
options.yellow: A place with lively festivals and lots of social interaction.
options.green: A peaceful cabin retreat in nature, near a quiet lake.
options.blue: A place with clear travel routes and familiar culture – minimal uncertainty.

5.text: What motivates you in everyday life?

options.red: The excitement of trying something no one else has dared yet.
options.yellow: The joy of seeing people around you smile and feel good.
options.green: The feeling of balance, inner peace and good, close relationships.
options.blue: Checking off tasks on a list and knowing everything is going according to plan.

6.text: How do you handle conflicts in a group?

options.red: Throw in a wild idea or activity to break the tension.
options.yellow: Get everyone together to talk it out, create mutual understanding.
options.green: Listen carefully, suggest compromises and point out common goals.
options.blue: Gather facts, analyze the problem and suggest a logical solution.

options.red: Learn best through hands-on experimentation, preferably without instructions.
options.yellow: Learn through discussing and exploring the topic with others.
options.green: Learn at a calm pace, preferably by observing and reflecting.
options.blue: Learn best by reading structured material and following a clear process.

options.red: A surprise party where no one quite knows what happens next.
options.yellow: A big gathering with music, dancing and lots of good conversations.
options.green: A quiet get-together with few, close friends, soft voices and deep conversation.
options.blue: A carefully planned dinner with an exact guest list, menu and program.

9.text: What kind of gifts do you prefer to give?

options.red: Something completely unexpected, maybe an artwork made in the moment.
options.yellow: An experience where several can participate and enjoy together.
options.green: A thoughtful, personal gift that shows consideration and familiarity.
options.blue: A useful, practical gift that the recipient can use effectively.

10.text: When you need to make an important decision:

options.red: Follow your gut feeling and hope for the best.
options.yellow: Ask friends for their opinions, and let the community guide the way.
options.green: Think about how this will affect the harmony in your relationships.
options.blue: Gather information, weigh pros and cons systematically.

11.text: What makes you most satisfied after a long day?

options.red: Having experienced something completely new, unexpected and exciting.
options.yellow: Having shared good moments with many people.
options.green: Having had a deep, meaningful conversation with someone you care about.
options.blue: Having completed all tasks exactly as planned.

options.red: You look forward to all the uncertain and unknown you can explore.
options.yellow: You envision a life filled with good friends and lots of joy.
options.green: You hope for stability, close relationships and inner peace.
options.blue: You imagine a well-organized, well-structured life with clear goals.

camera.title: Take a picture of your inner superhero!
camera.subtitle: Let's see how you look as your personal superhero type.

generating.timeEstimate: This may take up to a minute

permission.title: Activate camera
permission.description: To take a superhero photo, we need access to your camera

instructions.Chrome: Click the camera icon in the address bar ➜ Allow
instructions.Firefox: Click the camera icon on the left in the address bar ➜ Allow
instructions.Safari: Go to Safari ➜ Settings ➜ Websites ➜ Camera ➜ Allow
instructions.default: Enable camera access in browser settings

permission.allowPrompt: Allow camera access when the browser asks.
permission.browserInstructions: Browser-specific instructions will be shown here

errors.streamStart: Could not start video stream. Please try again.
errors.access: Could not access the camera. Please check that your browser has access to your camera.
errors.capture: An error occurred while taking the photo. Please try again.
